message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Alice, $150 is a bit high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $85 right now. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $120, which is the lowest I can go.
